name: Nikolai Pokrovski
short_description: Pokrov - a spiritually religious movement found by Archipokrovitel Nikola to unite the God believers from the different religions into one faith of God. This spiritually religious movement provides guidance and help to those who need to change their karma, in health, in a family, in a business, and to change the bioenergy of the person. It is the best way out from the crisis situation. At Pokrov.com you can read the topics on religion, alternative medicine and paranormal.
summary: Pokrov - a spiritually religious movement found by Archipokrovitel Nik
